places.name: Zona Colonial
places.adcopy: The Colonial Zone is the historical heart of Santo Domingo, full of colonial architecture and vibrant culture.

places.name: El Limón Waterfall
places.adcopy: A majestic waterfall in the heart of Samaná, ideal for adventurers and nature lovers.

places.name: Pico Duarte
places.adcopy: The highest point in the Caribbean, perfect for experienced hikers seeking an epic adventure.

places.name: Bahía de las Águilas
places.adcopy: One of the most pristine and beautiful beaches in the Caribbean, located in the southwest of the country.

places.name: 27 Waterfalls of Damajagua
places.adcopy: An exciting route of waterfalls and natural slides, ideal for adrenaline lovers.

places.name: Cayo Levantado
places.adcopy: A paradise island with white sands and crystal-clear waters, perfect for relaxation.

places.name: Altos de Chavón
places.adcopy: A Mediterranean-style artistic village overlooking the Chavón River with a vibrant cultural life.

places.name: Los Haitises National Park
places.adcopy: A unique ecosystem with mangroves, caves, and incredible biodiversity to explore by boat.
